attributes.action: Do whatever is needed to upgrade the rail system to alleviate overcrowding.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All i think is needed is some investment in the network and some new carriages. Not by 2014 but right now. By 2014 the overcrowding will be worse still. Also are the trains not much more environmentally friendly than millions of people commuting by car. As a nation we are years behind the rest of the worlds train networks is it not time to catch up?

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/railrevolution/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
